name: Research Assistant Agent
description: An AI agent that assists with academic research tasks including literature search, summarization, and citation management.

skills.name: Literature Search
skills.description: Search academic databases for relevant papers and articles
examples: Find recent papers on transformer architectures
Search for studies on climate change impacts in Southeast Asia

skills.name: Paper Summarization
skills.description: Generate concise summaries of academic papers
examples: Summarize this paper on epistemic injustice
Give me the key findings from this study
